roleset.name: put securely
roleset.note: TUCK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'tuck' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 9.3-2, verbs of manner of putting into place. (from tuck.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: The beds at the Bowery Mission seem far drearier when [he]-1 has *trace*-1 to tuck a little girl into one of them at night.

example.name: passivized
example.text: Mr. Trotter's painting showed a wall of wood boards with painted ribbons tacked down in a rectangle; tucked *trace*-1 behind the ribbons were [envelopes, folded, faded and crumpled papers and currency]-1.

roleset.name: give criminal sentence
roleset.note: TUCK_AWAY-V NOTES: This is not what I feel to be the normal usage of tuck away, but it'sthe only example in treebank. (from tuck.02-v)

example.name: weird example
example.text: Judge Robert (``Maximum Bob'') Potter sentenced Jim Bakker to 45 years in the big house yesterday, while a Beverly Hills judge tucked away Zsa Zsa Gabor for three days, plus 120 hours of work with homeless women.
example.arg: for three days, plus 120 hours of work with homeless women

roleset.name: put your shirt in your pants
roleset.note: TUCK_IN-V NOTES: Oddly enough, if the pants are mentioned, the verb defaults back totuck.01. (from tuck.03-v)

example.name: Haole?
example.text: [Richard Chamberlain]-1 dresses as a ``Mainland haole,'' *trace*-1 tucking in a Hawaiian shirt and rolling up its long sleeves.
